contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Agogo | Type = [[Compilation album]] | Artist = [[KMFDM]] | Cover = Kmfdmagogo.jpg | Released = 1998 November 17 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Industrial music|Industrial]] | Length = 42:24 | Label = [[Wax Trax! Records]]/[[TVT Records]] | Producer = | Chronology = [[KMFDM]] [[Compilation album|compilations]] | Last album = ''[[Retro (KMFDM album)|Retro]]''<br/>(1996) | This album = '''''Agogo'''''<br/>(1998) | Next album = ''[[84–86]]''<br/>(2004) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|3|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r382168|pure_url=yes}}</ref> | noprose = yes }} '''''Agogo''''' is a rarities [[album]] by [[KMFDM]]. ''Agogo'' comprises numerous tracks either previously unreleased, released on other compilations, or otherwise not widely available. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | lyrics_credits = no | music_credits = no | title1 = Thank You | note1 = previously unreleased) (originally to be the first Track on [[Money (album)|Money]] | length1 = 0:44 | title2 = Godlike | note2 = originally from ''[[Naïve (album)|Naïve]]'' | length2 = 3:34 | title3 = Virus | note3 = Dub) (originally from ''[[Naïve (album)|Naïve]]'' | length3 = 6:25 | title4 = Rip the System | note4 = originally from ''[[More & Faster]]'' | length4 = 3:34 | title5 = Naff Off | note5 = originally from ''[[More & Faster]]'' | length5 = 4:17 | title6 = [[Mysterious Ways (song)|Mysterious Ways]] | note6 = [[U2]] cover from the ''[[Shut Up Kitty]]'' [[compilation album]] | length6 = 3:10 | title7 = Ooh La La | note7 = originally from the ''[[Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth|Hellraiser III]] Soundtrack'' | length7 = 4:02 | title8 = Hole in the Wall | note8 = Remix) (previously unreleased, originally to appear on ''[[Glory (KMFDM song)|Glory]]'' | length8 = 4:23 | title9 = Agogo | note9 = previously unreleased | length9 = 7:01 | title10 = Zip | note10 = originally from non-Wax Trax versions of ''[[What Do You Know, Deutschland?]]'' | length10 = 5:12 }} ==References== {{reflist}} {{1990s-album-stub}} [[Category:KMFDM compilation albums]] [[Category:1998 compilation albums]] [[Category:TVT Records compilation albums]] {{KMFDM}}
